title: Fruit Consumption May Reduce Risk of Aneurysm
author: PipeTabor
cleaned_text: Include 2 fruits daily in your diet-note that fruit JUICE does NOT count. AANP via Circulation - High Intake Of Fruits May Reduce Aortic Aneurysm Risk - (Wednesday, August 21, 2013)-Scientists have found that a diet high in fruit might decrease the risk of developing an abdominal aortic aneurysm, which is often fatal.
